comments.comment:
What a uncivilized way of criticizing opponents.!!! Your language is disgusting, vulgar and filthy.!!!You disgrace our Buddhist Prelates first and now want to disgrace Wimal Weerawansa on his personal life, which you shouldn't.!!!!
What kind of politicians we have in our country, slinging mud at each and disgracing the opponents and criticizing each other.!!  Those people who are applauding to such disgusting speeches too are damn fools.!!  
What public want to know is whether the said policies and promises made by politicians on the stages are going to be realized or not.!!!  Not bothered about other people's personal affairs and talk about such things in a low manner.!!!
PLEASE LOOK AT YOURSELF, BEFORE CRITICIZING PEOPLE IN A THIRD CLASS WAY.!!!!
comments.author: KENSHIRO
